section.title: The Page Not Found Page
section.para: The Page Not Found page is a page that is displayed when you open a link to a page that cannot be found in the Red Hat Virtualization Manager. The elements of the Page Not Found page that can be customized are as follows:

listitem.para: The link to forward and the associated message for that link

section.para: The classes for the Page Not Found page are located in welcome_style.css.
